about_the_game:
Interstellar Shore: Synopsis and Art Illustration
The Interstellar Shore Program |
ILIVE: The Illuminating Life-Intelligence Venture Engine

The project was initiated as an Art-Tech-Philosophical Transdisciplinary Experiment collaborated by students from MIT. Subsequently, young creators from universities and colleges around the world joined in this collaborative transdisciplinary experiment.


This timely avant-garde transdisciplinary work pioneers the concept of "life intelligence" with a metaphysical space odyssey. Surging atop the AI explosion of 2022, it elevates discourse and provokes thoughts on human-machine relations, even arrays alternative futures.


Via the Bridge of Myth and the legend of Interstellar Shore, Tabman and Shawn(you) set off to find new cosmic frontiers. You explore, climb, play, age, sicken, create, forget, pursue, and examine identity and existential question.


Echoing Heidegger, our essence lies in living "the question". Like art, this visionary work "brings the truth of Being to shine forth" — a digital-age satori unveiling reality as infinite self-discovery. Challenging Cartesian duality, it collapses inner/outer onto a Möbius strip threading through all infinitudes. Proposing technology as portal to awakening, this work generates insight into consciousness creating worlds anew with inter-enabling technology and humanity. Destined to shape the zeitgeist of generations to come.


The work invites people to examine ego, id, superego - and beyond. The solid story, ample details and tripartite metaphorical allusions make the experience profoundly provoking.


Hey, think about Tabman the name - anything new you are feeling now?

The Interstellar Shore Program |
ILIVE: The Illuminating Life-Intelligence Venture Engine

The project was initiated as an Art-Tech-Philosophical Transdisciplinary Experiment collaborated by students from MIT. Subsequently, young creators from universities and colleges around the world joined in this collaborative transdisciplinary experiment.


This timely avant-garde transdisciplinary work pioneers the concept of "life intelligence" with a metaphysical space odyssey. Surging atop the AI explosion of 2022, it elevates discourse and provokes thoughts on human-machine relations, even arrays alternative futures.


Via the Bridge of Myth and the legend of Interstellar Shore, Tabman and Shawn(you) set off to find new cosmic frontiers. You explore, climb, play, age, sicken, create, forget, pursue, and examine identity and existential question.

name: Interstellar Shore VR: I LIVE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X, Intel Core i7-6800K or equivalent CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 or equivalent GPU
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR，SteamVR link
  • Additional Notes: PCVR Stream link
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i7 10+ or equivalent CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3080 or equivalent GPU
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR，SteamVR link
  • Additional Notes: PCVR Stream link

short_description: This timely avant-garde transdisciplinary work pioneers the concept of "life intelligence" with a metaphysical space odyssey. Surging atop the AI explosion of 2022, it elevates discourse and provokes thoughts on human-machine relations, even arrays alternative futures.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
